# Earthbind, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Bard Spells|Bard 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)

**Targets:** Creatures in a 20-ft.-radius burst

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Miniatures Handbook (WotC), pg. 40

This spell functions like *earthbind,* except that it affects multiple creatures.
